pod.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a long narrow seed container that grows on various plants, especially peas and beans
pod.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a part of a space vehicle that can be separated from the main part
pod.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a long narrow container for petrol or other substances, especially one carried under an aircraft wing
pod.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: a group of sea animals, such as whales or dolphins, that swim together
